name: Zera The Disestablishmentarian - Darker text
description:
Darkened text and a splash of color.
Modifies wordpress "Twenty Ten" theme.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("zerathesecularist.wordpress.com") {

.entry-utility .tag-links .entry-utility-prep,
.entry-utility .cat-links .entry-utility-prep,
.entry-meta .meta-prep-author
 {color: #005000 !important;} /* green */

h2.entry-title a {color: maroon !important;}

.entry-utility .comments-link a,
.entry-utility .edit-link a,
#site-description,
.entry-meta .entry-date
 {color: #AE2268 !important;} /* wine */

.entry-utility .meta-sep,
.entry-meta .meta-sep {color: black !important;}

.entry-utility .cat-links a,
.entry-utility .tag-links a,
.entry-meta a
 {color: #2C72C7 !important;} /* med slate blue */

.logged-in-as,
#content .page .entry-content p,
#content .post .entry-content p
 {color: black !important;}

#subscribe-label,
#subscribe-blog-label,
.comment-form-comment label,
.form-allowed-tags,
#site-generator {color: #303030 !important;}
#site-generator a
 {color: #2C72C7 !important;} /* med slate blue */

}
